      • getIterationIndex

        public int getIterationIndex()
        Description copied from class: TaskState
        When Control Flow actions are performed (see Task.getFlowScript()), some tasks are replicated. A task replicated by a FlowActionType.LOOP action is differentiated from the original by an incremented Iteration Index.
        Specified by:
        getIterationIndex in class TaskState
        Returns:
        the iteration number of this task if it was replicated by a LOOP flow operation (>= 0)

        public int getReplicationIndex()
        Description copied from class: TaskState
        When Control Flow actions are performed (see Task.getFlowScript()), some tasks are replicated. A task replicated by a FlowActionType.REPLICATE action is differentiated from the original by an incremented Replication Index.
        Specified by:
        getReplicationIndex in class TaskState
        Returns:
        the replication number of this task if it was replicated by a REPLICATE flow operations (>= 0)
